video_prompt: Ethereal female face with eyes slowly opening, her glowing hair subtly undulating. A vibrant, translucent tulip expands and shifts its rainbow hues. Iridescent butterflies flutter and swarm, their wings subtly catching light. Beams of light subtly pulse and refract across a shimmering, starry background.
image_prompt: Mystical, ethereal digital artwork: Serene, pearlescent female face with closed eyes and glowing, flowing hair, framed by a subtle halo. Dominating the upper half is a large, translucent, rainbow-gradient tulip with luminous petals. Numerous glowing white and light blue butterflies flit around. Soft, luminous background with sparkling dust and celestial light beams. Dominated by purples, blues, and whites, with vibrant rainbow accents. Hyperrealistic with dreamlike, fantastical elements. Themes: beauty, tranquility, nature, spirituality.
refined_video_prompt: Eyes slowly open, a shifting expression forming. Glowing hair subtly undulates. A translucent tulip expands, its rainbow hues dynamically shifting. Iridescent butterflies flutter and swarm, their wings continuously catching and reflecting light. Beams of light subtly pulse and refract, altering the shimmering, starry background.
